modName: Sansa Stark from Game of Thrones - Standalone Follower Mod (SSE) - DELETED
summary: This mods adds my standalone follower, Sansa Stark, from the TV show Game of Thrones. She's been ported from TES V Skyrim to Skyrim SE.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PE9DTTc.png[/img]﻿﻿﻿

[img]https://i.imgur.com/L8qGbCd.png[/img][/size]
[size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/size]

[size=3][i]This is my first serious standalone follower.

[u]You can add screenshots! I'll be waiting yours.

[/u][/i][i][u][img]http://image.prntscr.com/image/8b4cece25815466abda6ca557ba9c853.png[/img][/u][/i][/size]

[size=2][color=#ff0000]*Note:[/color] English is not my native language, I'll do my best to explain you all about this mod.[/size]

[size=6]► [color=#8e7cc3]INFORMATION[/color] ◄[/size]
[i][img]http://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
[size=3]
[i]Sansa is the eldest daughter and second child of Lady Catelyn and Lord Eddard Stark, head of House Stark and Warden of the North. She was born and raised at Winterfell. In her eleven years, she learns the duties of a noble daughter and is tutored in the traditional womanly activities.[/i]

[i]This mods adds my standalone follower, Sansa Stark, from the TV show Game of Thrones.[/i]

[i]Body - CBBE Curvy (Will add the UNP version in the future)[/i]
[i]Skin - Fair Skin[/i]
[/size][/font][i][size=3]Combat Style - Two Handed[/size][/i][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][i]
She can be found inside Dragonsreach (Whiterun), ready to follow you.
She carries a lot of potions, poisons and food.
Levels with the player.

[i][img]http://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i][/i][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]
[/size]
[/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=6]►[color=#e69138] [/color][color=#f6b26b]MODS USED ON THE SCREENSHOTS[/color] ◄[/size]
[i][img]http://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
[/font][font=Trebuchet MS]
*They all are from TES V Skyrim*

[size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28736/?]Queen of the damned-Akasha Dress by Newermind43[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073/]More Dresses from Apachii Divine Elegance Store by Apachii[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks by Nivea [/url]

[i][img]http://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/aQdbGCp.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img]

[i]Bethesda for making this fantastic game.
[/i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]Expired[/url] for Racemenu.
[i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665/?]Kalilies[/url] for the hair.
[/i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027/?]Hvergelmir[/url] for the brows.
[i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756/?]LogRaam[/url]  for the eyes.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148/?]Apachii[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2959649/?]Newermind43[/url] for the clothes used on screenshots.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/55918/?]Nivea[/url] for the cloaks used on screenshots.
[/i][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url] for the body used on screenshots.[/i]
[i]Nexus Community for making me possible to share this mod.
[/i][/size]
[size=2][color=#ff0000]*Note:[/color] Write me a PM if you consider that you must be on the credits list[/size][/font].

[size=5]Check out my other mods & screenshots!
